channel.title: maGaming RSS Feed - aftermath_site
channel.description: A cleaned-up version of the original gaming feed for aftermath_site

item.title: ‘This Guy Should Be Beaten To Death With Baseball Bats’
item.content:encoded:
The Video Game History Foundation does incredible work preserving all kinds of treasure and relics from the past. A lot of that work is important, but some of it is also very funny.

This being the VGHF, if you need to see a transcript of the audio or images of the CD itself, they've got you covered.

Stay in touch

Sign up for our free newsletter

EA Says It Will Retain Creative Control Following Saudi Sale, But, Like, Come On

Big companies have shown time and time again that they'll say whatever is necessary to get mergers approved

How Am I Supposed To Review Europa Universalis V

There is simply too much video game here, and it's always in motion

And Also, Who Even Cares About Halo And Lord Of The Rings These Days

"All of these things do have a feeling of dragging and resuscitating a corpse"

I Will Grind In Final Fantasy Tactics Every Single Time And You Cannot Stop Me

Final Fantasy Tactics without grinding Mandalia Plains is like a day without sunshine.

We Have Never Been More 12 Years Old

In the same week government agencies coopted Halo, now we've also got JD Vance weighing on in CollarGate
